fixed_skill.desc: Deal Bless damage to all foes equal to 65.8/70.0/74.2% of Attack. Gain 1 to 2 Blessing stacks.
fixed_skill.name: Makougaon

innate_skill.desc: Deal Almighty damage to all foes equal to 40.7/42.7/44.8% of Attack, ignoring their defense.
innate_skill.name: Megidola

innate_skill.desc: Increase party's ailment accuracy and ailment resistance by 6.5%/6.8%/7.2%, and Speed by 3 for 3 turns. For every 25% of the user's ailment accuracy, increase party's ailment accuracy by 1.1%/1.2%/1.2% more, up to 4.4%/4.6%/4.8%.
innate_skill.name: Masukukaja

passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack by 17.7%. For each foe present, increase user's Bless damage by 7.6%. Stacks up to 5 times.
passive_skill.name: Guardian God's Kingship

passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack by 17.7%. For each foe present, increase user's Bless damage by 8.6%. Stacks up to 5 times.
passive_skill.name: Guardian God's Kingship

passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack by 17.7%. For each foe present, increase user's Bless damage by 9.7%. Stacks up to 5 times.
passive_skill.name: Guardian God's Kingship II

showtime_skill.desc: Deal Bless damage to all foes equal to 180.0%/192.6%/205.2% of Attack.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
